attributes.action: Change of Prime Minister limited to twice within any fixed parliament period.
attributes.additional_details: I want the above to happen to respect the democratic right of people. To have three changes of Prime Minister in a single parliamentary period seriously undermines the original agenda that a party was elected under. It is therefore right that the people have the ability to examine any changes to their manifesto before a new PM takes office.
attributes.background: If the ruling parliamentary party wants to change the Prime Minister for a third time a General Election must be called.
